title: JavaScript Fundamentals
description: Master the fundamentals of JavaScript programming with hands-on exercises and real-world projects. Learn variables, functions, objects, and modern ES6+ features.

title: Spanish for Beginners
description: Start your Spanish learning journey with essential vocabulary, grammar, and conversational skills. Perfect for complete beginners who want to communicate effectively.

title: Advanced Calculus
description: Dive deep into advanced calculus concepts including limits, derivatives, integrals, and differential equations. Ideal for students preparing for advanced mathematics.

title: React Development Masterclass
description: Build modern web applications with React.js. Learn components, hooks, state management, and best practices for creating scalable React applications.

title: French Conversation Practice
description: Improve your French speaking skills through interactive conversations and pronunciation exercises. Focus on real-world scenarios and cultural contexts.

title: Python for Data Science
description: Learn Python programming specifically for data analysis and visualization. Cover pandas, numpy, matplotlib, and basic machine learning concepts.

title: Linear Algebra Essentials
description: Foundation course in linear algebra covering vectors, matrices, eigenvalues, and applications in computer science and engineering.

title: German Language Basics
description: Introduction to German language with focus on grammar, vocabulary, and practical communication skills for everyday situations.
